example.code:
PS C:\> Update-SSMMaintenanceWindow -WindowId "mw-03eb9db42890fb82d" -Name "My-Renamed-MW"
AllowUnassociatedTargets : False Cutoff : 1 Duration : 2 Enabled : True Name : My-Renamed-MW Schedule : cron(0 */30 * * * ? *) WindowId : mw-03eb9db42890fb82d
example.description: This example updates the name of a maintenance window.

example.code:
PS C:\> Update-SSMMaintenanceWindow -WindowId "mw-03eb9db42890fb82d" -Enabled $true
AllowUnassociatedTargets : False Cutoff : 1 Duration : 2 Enabled : True Name : My-Renamed-MW Schedule : cron(0 */30 * * * ? *) WindowId : mw-03eb9db42890fb82d
example.description: This example enables a maintenance window.

example.code:
PS C:\> Update-SSMMaintenanceWindow -WindowId "mw-03eb9db42890fb82d" -Enabled $false
AllowUnassociatedTargets : False Cutoff : 1 Duration : 2 Enabled : False Name : My-Renamed-MW Schedule : cron(0 */30 * * * ? *) WindowId : mw-03eb9db42890fb82d
example.description: This example disables a maintenance window.
